name: Nocturne's Curtain Call
effect:
Ballad of the Crossroads
Max HP increases by 10~18%.
When triggering Lunar reactions or inflicting Lunar Reaction DMG on opponents, the equipping character will recover 14~18 Energy, and receive the Bountiful Sea's Sacred Wine effect for 12s: Max HP increases by an additional 14~22%, CRIT DMG from Lunar Reaction DMG increases by 60~140%.
The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.

materials.caption: Mora
Sundered Glory of the Far-North Scions
Unyielding Delusion of the Far-North Scions
Oblation of the Far-North Scions
Aureate Radiance of the Far-North Scions
Fractured Eye of the Deep Shadow
Aberrant Core of the Deep Shadow
Hooked Beak of the Deep Shadow
Tattered Warrant
Immaculate Warrant
Frost-Etched Warrant

passives:
Max HP increases by 10%.
When triggering Lunar reactions or inflicting Lunar Reaction DMG on opponents, the equipping character will recover 14 Energy, and receive the Bountiful Sea's Sacred Wine effect for 12s: Max HP increases by an additional 14%, CRIT DMG from Lunar Reaction DMG increases by 60%.
The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.

The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.

The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.
